name: BornoCMS
body:
###Requirement
---
    PHP/MYSQL
    Apache
    Apache rewrite mod must be enable
---


###Progress

    Download the source code and upload it in your directory
    Create a Database
    Run http://youdirectory/install.php
    Fill up the form
    Click Submit

Login and ready your site from http://yourdirectroy/admin/

Don't Forget to say thanks

#D##ownload Plugins and Themes

Temporay themes and plugins are avilable here http://goo.gl/iH3OSA
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
